title: WATCHMEN Season 1 Ending Explained! Easter Eggs, Season 2 Theories, and Unanswered Questions
author: Think Story
comment: Thanks to all of you for sticking through my terrible intros and watching Watchmen with me. Would love to hear what you thought about the season below and if you have any theories for season 2.! Waffles on me if it gets renewed! 😉🧇
No one mentions that lady trues first appearance is actually her buying the land where ozymandious lands from Jupiter
This season was a master piece of television and storytelling for me. I'm in love with it!
Another easter egg is when Jane Crawford instructs Lady Trieu to “Do it.” It mirrors Rorschach’s last moment with Dr. Manhattan.
Oh man, I loved this series. I remember when people's first reaction about the show was that it was a cashgrab but honestly it's probably the best new thing to come out this entire year.
description:
In this video we take a deep dive and breakdown episode 9, the season 1 finale, of HBO's Watchmen "See How They Fly". We'll recap, review, point out easter eggs, look at season 2 theories, and details you missed of the series based off the graphic novel by Alan Moore and Dave Gibbons.

Follow me on twitter: www.twitter.com/thinkstoryYT
